J. TOM WATSON, as Attorney General of the State of Florida, and P. B. McCormick, individually v. LOCAL DIVISION NO. 1267 OF THE AMALGAMATED ASSOCIATION OF STREET, ELECTRIC RAILWAY AND MOTOR COACH EMPLOYEES OF AMERICA; W. O. FRAZIER; THOMAS L. McBRAYER; MIAMI TRANSIT COMPANY; and R. D. FREEMAN. 38 So. (2nd) 224 December 21, 1948

Fall Term, .1948

Division A

Affirmed.
